Reviews.Title: New Sprint Sanyo 2700
Reviews.Author: John T. Bowie
Reviews.Content: I just Love the phone and if I had a chance to buy another just like it I wouldn't hesitate, Its very easy to understand and very simple to operate, I really just Love the phone

ProductInfo.Features:
Messaging phone in Blue with full QWERTY keyboard, dedicated text and emoticon softkeys
GPS turn-by-turn directions via Sprint Navigation; access to social networking sites as well as both personal and corporate email
1.3-megapixel camera for still photos; Bluetooth for handsfree devices; speakerphone; voice dialing; voice memo recording
Up to 4.8 hours of talk time
What's in the Box: handset, battery, charger, battery door, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: NEW Sprint Sanyo SCP-2700 Cell Phone (Blue)
